name: Steam Machine
description:
Watch as the gears of the Steam Machine turn, and earn money based on its output. Even while you are offline the gears of the Steam Machine will turn, so make sure you still have plenty of time on the machine before you leave.

Features:

A save system

Multipliers based on the amount owned of each generator

Multipliers based on the amount owned of all generators

Upgrades that will increase production amount and time

A prestige system
